department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程
department.en: International Master of Business Administration program

goal.ch: The objective of this course is to familiarize students with leadership and communication styles, theories, and issues. The class uses a case teaching approach with a combination of lectures, presentations, and group discussions.
goal.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize students with leadership and communication styles, theories, and issues. The class uses a case teaching approach with a combination of lectures, presentations, and group discussions.

outline.ch:
1 (2/20)Class introduction
2 (2/27)Introduction: Leadership and Communication
Case 1: Jean-Claude Biver: The Reemergence of the Swiss Watch Industry
3 (3/6)Oral Report 1: Trait Theory; Behavioral Theories
Case 2: Susan Duffy: Leading Quietly
4 (3/13)Oral Report 2: Contingency Theories
Case 3: An Emerging Leader: Nora has a New Job
5 (3/20)Oral Report 3: Attribution Theory
Case 4: Succession at Taiwan’s Hop Lion Feather Works: Not Leaving it to Change
6 (3/27)Oral Report 4: Psychodynamic Leadership Approach
Case 5: The Perils and Pitfalls of Leading Change: A Young Manager‘s Turnaround Journey
7 (4/3)No Classes - Children’s Day and Tomb Sweeping Day
8 (4/10)Oral Report 5: Neocharismatic Leadership
Case 6: Thomas Cook Group: Do Insiders or Outsiders Make Better CEOs?
9 (4/17)Oral Report 6: Leader-Member Exchange Theory
Case 7: Chem-ARC: Playing the Blame Game
10 (4/24)Oral Report 7: Idiosyncrasy Credit Model of Leadership
Case 8: Wells Fargo: Setting the Stagecoach Thundering Again
11 (5/1)Oral Report 8: Symbolic Leadership
Case 9: Singareni Collieries: From Gloom to Glory
12 (5/8)Oral Report 9: Micro-politics Approach to Leadership
Case 10: Google LLC: The Diversity Manifesto and Leader Candour
13 (5/15)Oral Report 10: Role Theory of Leadership
Case 11: Surbana Jurong: Navigating Organisational Challenges in a Mass Termination
14 (5/22)Oral Report 11: Social Learning Theory of Leadership
Case 12: Thompson Rivers University: Balancing Care and Justice
15 (5/29)Project Writing
16 (6/5)Project Deadline
